div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1471 Kat√¥ Paphos (anc. Nea Paphos), 1965 Burial: c. 305 B.C. (M) Contents: 13 AR. From excavations Alexander III: 4 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 1, Pella 1, Sala- mis 1, Babylon 1) 5 lifetime and early post. dr. (Lampsacus 2, Colophon 1, Miletus 1, Sardes 1) Philip III: 3 tetradr. (Aradus 1, Babylon 1, Susa 1) 1 dr. (Sardes) Disposition: Nicosia BCH 1966, p. 355
